title: Is there any page where you can see peoples' replies to my comments?
body:
I may just be stupid, but I haven't found a way to the page where you see peoples' replies to my comments aside from clicking on the little speech bubble thing in the upper right when I have 30+ recent replies.  There has to be some way to check them without waiting for that many, but I haven't found out how.

Thanks for any help you can give (even if it's telling me that there is no other way), and sorry if I've just been blind or an idiot.
